> Somebody suggested I look at the TestSetup class in the extensions
> package, but I didn't get very far with that approach.

Notice that TestSuite implements the Test interface. Therefore you can wrap
a TestSuite containing all your tests into a TestSetup instance performing
the necessary once-for-all setup.

ciao, Ilja
subject: AW: [junit] Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
